mapper.select: SELECT b.doc_name doctorName, a.*, c.result_score FROM t_appraisal_month_sign_team_increment a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT team_id, doc_name FROM t_doctor WHERE leader_flag = 1 ) b ON a.team_id = b.team_id LEFT JOIN t_appraisal_month_team_score c ON a.team_id = c.team_id AND a.`month` = c.`month` WHERE a.`month` = #{0}
